trends: There have been no other sightings in Wood-Ridge
This sighting has been favorited 6 times.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sleeping from 11:15pm- 4pm when I had to use the bathroom. I tried going back to sleep but was restless. I finally fell back to sleep when I had a feeling of being held down. It was around 5:45am which is 15 minutes earlier than I usually wake up during the week. I was trying to wake up but I couldn't, I started kicking slowly and tried opening my eyes. I tried screaming but could not make any noise. After kicking harder I started opening my eyes and noticed that my hand were being help against my chest by a being that was standing on the left of my bed. I kicked on last time and then was able to speak and said get the "F" off of me! It started awkardly running towards my window where it dissappeared. the lights were off but I could tell the the being was short around 4ft tall slender like a child, completely naked with no body hair, and dark grey in color. I did not see and facial features.
Summary: I did not actually see a ufo, but a being
